Constant Field Values

UI_VISIBLE_RELATIONS_THRESHOLD

public static final String UI_VISIBLE_RELATIONS_THRESHOLD
The UIManager key for an int specifying how many relations are painted.
  • If visibleRelationsThreshold < 0 all relations are painted.
  • If visibleRelationsThreshold >= 0 only the relations of the visible row are painted plus the relations of the threshold row count above and below the visible rows.
For example, if the visible row are 10 to 20 and the threshold is 25 then the relations of the entries at 0-10 and 21-45 are painted if they cross over the visible part of the gantt chart.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
